Description: The Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) enterprise identity service provides SSO and multi-factor authentication to help protect your users from 99.9 per cent of cybersecurity attacks.
Name: Microsoft Azure Active Directory

Methods.Name: List User's Group Memberships
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified user's group memberships.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single user by ID.

Methods.Name: Get User's Manager
Methods.Description: Retrieves details of a user's manager. If now manager found exits via false path.

Methods.Name: List New Users
Methods.Description: Retrieves all users created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Group Members
Methods.Description: Retrieves all members of the specified group.

Methods.Name: Get Group
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single group by ID.

Methods.Name: List Rooms
Methods.Description: Retrieves all rooms in a tenant.

Methods.Name: List Room Lists
Methods.Description: Retrieves all room lists in a tenant.

Methods.Name: List Rooms By Room List
Methods.Description: Retrieves all rooms in the specified room list.

Methods.Name: List Owned Devices
Methods.Description: Retrieves devices that are owned by the user.

Methods.Name: Get Organization
Methods.Description: Retrieves the properties and relationships of the currently authenticated organization.
